revised_title: Understanding and Mitigating Erosion Damage in Steam Turbine Blading
tldr: This article discusses the damage caused to steam turbine blades by erosion due to the impact of water droplets. It explains the processes of drop formation, release, and motion before impact with the blades. The author suggests ways to reduce erosion damage, such as designing blades with better aerodynamics and reducing the surface area of stationary nozzles.
